merits.name: Acute Senses
merits.description: Your physical senses are unusually sharp, capturing nuances that few people ever notice.
merits.gameEffects: Reduces difficulty of Perception-based rolls by -2. At 1-point level, a single sense (vision, hearing, touch, taste, smell) is more acute; at 3-point level, all five physical senses are equally sharp.

merits.name: Dark Triad
merits.description: A charming and chilling blend of narcissism, Machiavellianism, and sociopathy makes you a smooth-talking rule-breaker. Your devotees are ultimately expendable toys to you.
merits.gameEffects: Adds three dice to all Seduction, Manipulation, Leadership, Subterfuge, and Charisma-based rolls. Story downside: amoral behavior may alienate or endanger the character.

merits.name: Language
merits.description: Beyond your native language, you understand another form of communication in both written and spoken forms.
merits.gameEffects: Each 1-pt Merit reflects a single language. With 5+ Language Merits, can attempt to unravel unknown languages (Intelligence + Enigmas, difficulty 7+).

merits.name: Stormwarden/Quantum Voyager
merits.description: Despite the fury of the Avatar Storm, you remain immune and can traverse the Gauntlet without suffering its effects.
merits.gameEffects: For 3 points: pass through Gauntlet without harm. For 5 points: protect everyone and everything you touch. Incredibly rare ability.

merits.name: Ties
merits.description: You have connections in high, low, or in-between places - police, underworld, media, etc. Each type must be purchased separately.
merits.gameEffects: Subtle requests: -2 difficulty. Significant favors: -1 difficulty. Must be maintained through roleplay.

merits.name: Too Tough to Die
merits.description: You're badass enough to shrug off injuries that would cripple or kill most people.
merits.gameEffects: Can soak lethal damage (NOT aggravated). Still takes normal healing time. Does not apply if Cinematic Damage option is used.

merits.name: True Faith
merits.description: Possessing convictions in a greater outside power, you can channel that power for miraculous feats beyond mere magick.
merits.gameEffects: One dot adds to countermagick and Willpower rolls. Can sense magick, drive away vampires, resist mind control at higher levels. Must be lived, not just recognized.

merits.name: Umbral Affinity
merits.description: You have an innate affinity for the Otherworlds, perhaps from shapeshifter blood or Pagan heritage.
merits.gameEffects: No ill effects from first and second-degree Acclimation. Other stages affect at one stage less. No Disembodiment worry for six months. Recognized as natural traveler in Umbral Realms.

merits.name: Berserker/Stress Atavism
merits.description: In combat you become a monster, destroying everything in sight. Can be Merit or Flaw depending on situation.
merits.gameEffects: Failed Willpower roll (diff 8) leads to rampage. Gain 3 Bruised levels, ignore wound penalties, +2 Strength, +1 Stamina. Everyone becomes enemy until incapacitated or left alone.

flaws.name: Addiction
flaws.description: You're addicted to some activity or substance that interferes with your daily life, driving you to irrational extremes.
flaws.gameEffects: 1 point for trivial enjoyments (games, tobacco, social media). 3 points for dangerous/illegal substances (cocaine, fight clubs, etc.). Causes social, legal, and physical/psychological costs.

flaws.name: Cursed
flaws.description: Misfortune of apparently supernatural origins makes your character's life difficult. Severity increases with point value.
flaws.gameEffects: 1pt: minor quirks (hard to keep secrets, tech malfunctions). 3pt: chronic misfortune (tools break, children fear you). 5pt: pervasive bad luck (endeavors fail, chronic pain). Storyteller determines effects and lifting methods.

flaws.name: Construct
flaws.description: You came from a lab, not a womb - grown, woven, shaped, or crafted rather than born. Social alienation keeps you at arm's length from humanity.
flaws.gameEffects: Inflicts penalties on social rolls in many situations. Combination of self-doubt and alienation, or sense of superiority, impedes character socially.

flaws.name: Deranged
flaws.description: You suffer from a lasting form of mental illness. Insanity lingers until cured and Flaw bought off.
flaws.gameEffects: 3-point: troubling but manageable insanity. 5-point: intense madness making character dangerous to self and others. Willpower roll might allow temporary coping. Essential for Marauders.

flaws.name: Echoes
flaws.description: You display weird phenomena associated with sorcery - strange vibrations, phantom music, gathering shadows, or visible Resonance marks.
flaws.gameEffects: 1pt: slight manifestations (shadow flickers, milk sours). 3pt: people recognize you as a mage. 5pt: reality shifts around you, animals react strongly, environmental changes radiate. Can be used as Resonance system.

flaws.name: Enemy
flaws.description: Someone hates your guts and will do whatever they can to make your life unpleasant.
flaws.gameEffects: Value determines strength and hatred of enemy: 1pt for minor grudge from inconsequential party, 5pt for deadly plans of powerful entity or group.

flaws.name: PTSD
flaws.description: Awful experiences have given you a hair-trigger response to certain situations - anxiety, aversions, phobias, rage.
flaws.gameEffects: 2pt: occasional nightmares under rare circumstances. 3pt: phobias in common situations. 4pt: near-panic and rapid mood swings. 5pt: major reactions (flashbacks, terror, catatonia) in fairly common situations. Difficult to treat even with magick.

flaws.name: Stress Atavism
flaws.description: Same as Berserker Merit but as a Flaw - when stressed you enter uncontrollable rage, attacking friend and foe alike.
flaws.gameEffects: Under stress, failed Willpower (diff 8) causes rampage. Gain 3 Bruised, ignore penalties, +2 Str, +1 Sta. Attack everyone until stopped. Major liability for subtlety-focused groups.
